textRuns.value: An Inconsistency has been found in the data regarding Manufacturing price and Sale Price.

We would expect that the Sale Price of a product would be always higher than the Manufacturing Price (otherwise it would make no sense to manufacture a product), but that's not the case for some products as you can see in the Table above. There are also other products with a Price Margin unexpectedly high, and the
Pricing Margin calculated (using Sale Price and Manufacturing price) differs very much from the Profit Margin calculated (using Profit and Sales ), which should be closer than they are.
This indicates that the data may have issues that need to be investigated further.
Therefore, in a real case scenario, this data should be reviewed in order to correct the issue before delivering the final dashboad to the end users.

For that reason, no Dashboard regarding Sale Price and Manufacturing Price was developed for this case (Only the 2 cards displayed on the Overview page, for the matter of compounding the whole financial scenario).
